# addOpacityRamp(_:)

**Instance Method**

Sets an opacity ramp to apply during a specified time range.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func addOpacityRamp(_ ramp: AVVideoCompositionLayerInstruction.OpacityRamp)
```

## Configuring the opacity

- **setOpacity(_:at:)**: Sets the opacity value at a specific time within the time range of the instruction.
- **opacityRamp(at:)**: Obtains the opacity ramp that includes a specified time.
